sentences.en: All members of the association adhere to a strict code of practice.
sentences.cn: 协会的所有成员都遵守一套严格的行为规范。

sentences.en: Blyth's association with the sea began in 1966.
sentences.cn: 布莱思的航海生涯始于1966年。

sentences.en: He arbitrates between investors and members of the association.
sentences.cn: 他在投资者和该协会成员之间作出仲裁。

sentences.en: his close association with the Green Party
Our association with him goes back four years.
sentences.cn: 我们同他的合作是从4年前开始的。

sentences.en: Scotland has all kinds of happy associations for me.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰给我各种各样愉快的联想。

sentences.en: Soon afterwards he joined the work of the peasants association.
sentences.cn: 不久之后,他就参加了农会的工作.

sentences.en: The Amateur Softball Association's roster of umpires has declined to 57,000.
sentences.cn: 业余垒球协会的裁判员名单上的人数已经减少到了57,000名。

sentences.en: The association between the two companies stretches back thirty years.
sentences.cn: 这两家公司的往来可以追溯到30年前。

sentences.en: The Association gives a free handbook to all new members.
sentences.cn: 协会给新成员人手一本免费手册。

sentences.en: The Association holds an annual reunion.
sentences.cn: 这个协会每年聚会一次。

sentences.en: The association is under the auspices of World Bank.
sentences.cn: 这个组织是在世界银行的赞助下办的.

sentences.en: The Football Association have had their say.
The Lawn Tennis Association suspended Mr Castle from the British team.
sentences.cn: 草地网球协会暂停了卡斯尔先生在英国队的职务。

sentences.en: The local club has disaffiliated from the National Athletic Association.
sentences.cn: 当地俱乐部已退出全国体育联合会。

sentences.en: The Professional Cricketers' Association held its annual dinner in London.
sentences.cn: 职业板球运动员协会在伦敦举办了自己的年度宴会。

sentences.en: the strong association between the disease and middle-aged women
sentences.cn: 这种疾病与中年女性的紧密联系

words.tran_cn: 联想心理学；观念联合论
联系（associate的过去式和过去分词）
联想；使联合；使发生联系
协会，联盟，社团；联合；[心理]联想

trans.tran_cn: 协会，联盟，关系，联系，联想，因果关系
trans.tran_en: an organization that consists of a group of people who have the same aims, do the same kind of work etc
